title: Tech News: Meta Still Wants to Make Zuck Bucks
itunes:title: Tech News: Meta Still Wants to Make Zuck Bucks
description:
Meta ditched Diem but still plans to introduce a digital currency that employees call "Zuck Bucks." Some of Mark Zuckerberg's employees refer to him as the "Eye of Sauron" and somehow he doesn't think that's a bad thing. And we hear about a lawsuit that claims IBM fudged numbers on its revenue filings.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Meta ditched Diem but still plans to introduce a digital currency that employees call "Zuck Bucks." Some of Mark Zuckerberg's employees refer to him as the "Eye of Sauron" and somehow he doesn't think that's a bad thing. And we hear about a lawsuit that claims IBM fudged numbers on its revenue filings.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:keywords: Meta, Facebook, Diem, cryptocurrency, digital currency, Zuck Bucks, semiconductors, semiconductor shortage, supply chain, Eye of Sauron, Vevo, YouTube, hacker, Paco Sanz, Twitter, embedded tweets, IBM, Microsoft, Edge, browser, Windows 11
